Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory236.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Changyu', 3: "East City's Xujiu Street... Wang's Pawn Shop, this is the last store.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Changyu is standing in front of a building and sifting through his memories. Seeing that it is still the same building as before, he enters the premises.'}
{3: 'In the pawnshop, a middle-aged man is sitting behind the counter, looking down at the panel in his hand. In his other, an old copper coin is being absentmindedly twirled.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Changyu', 3: "Boss Wang? I saw that you're hiring, so...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Boss Wang', 3: "Huh? But what's a kiddo like you doing here?"}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "Age isn't a problem. I can do whatever it is you need.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Boss Wang', 3: 'Know your way around machines?'}
{3: "Boss Wang slowly raises his head and taps a coin on the table. His indifferent tone feels like a sharp knife to Changyu's ears."}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "I, um... No, I don't.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Boss Wang', 3: 'Then shoo.'}
{2: 'Boss Wang', 3: "You can't possibly think the KCC still has any use for elbow grease now, do you?"}
{2: 'Boss Wang', 3: "Oh... I see. You're from the old parts down south. No wonder."}
{2: 'Boss Wang', 3: "Well then, be on your way. I don't have any use for a kid like you."}
{3: 'Boss Wang waves his hand at the door, motioning for Changyu to leave. Hearing this, Changyu takes a step forward instead.'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "It's not like that. Some things are best left to people.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Boss Wang', 3: "Oh? And what's that? I'm all ears."}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: 'Like... Pawning... You know, sales!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: 'Machines might replace the need for people in the service, manufacturing, or entertainment industries because they are good at imitating humans.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "But the one they can't do is barter!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: 'Each customer is different. You need intuition and honesty to understand their needs to make money.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Boss Wang', 3: 'Hmm, I see your point...'}
{2: 'Boss Wang', 3: 'However—'}
{3: "Boss Wang drags out his rebuttal to interrupt Changyu's rambling."}

{2: 'Boss Wang', 3: "A person's speech and behavior are telltale signs of their thoughts. You speak with confidence, but your eyes darted four times over the place—indicating that you've been nervous this whole time."}
{2: 'Boss Wang', 3: "Machines only have to pick up on this to simulate human emotion and adjust their sales strategy accordingly. That's not specific to humans."}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "...But that type of machine doesn't exist.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Boss Wang', 3: "Hmph, maybe you haven't heard..."}
{3: 'Boss Wang remarks coldly. Just as he is about to continue speaking, Changyu suddenly steps forward and puts his hand on the copper coin resting on the table.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Changyu', 3: "Think I don't know about the Fuxi Crew's research into human simulation?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Boss Wang', 3: "Oh? Looks like you aren't as naive as I thought."}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: 'I heard it from some big shot a long time ago.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "But a machine like that isn't something normal folks like us can afford.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: 'So this kind of job is best left to us humans for the time being.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "Ain't nothing wrong with replacing us with machines. But until then, do you really think someone in your condition can look after the shop all by yourself?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Boss Wang', 3: "How'd you know about my condition?"}
{3: 'Changyu lifts his hand off the coin and smiles.'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "Hehe, my bro Chen at our theater used to have this problem. I was a bit hesitant when I walked in at first. I didn't want to say anything without a closer look.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Boss Wang', 3: 'Sharp eh, kid?'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "I'll take that as a compliment.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Boss Wang', 3: 'Hmph.'}
{3: 'Hearing this, Boss Wang scoffs and leaves the store.'}
{2: 'Boss Wang', 3: 'You work 9 a.m. to 9 p.m. Six days a week. Salary is performance based.'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "So that means that I'm...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Boss Wang', 3: "Hmph, you're starting tomorrow. Don't be late on your first day of work."}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: 'Alrighty!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory236.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Changyu', 3: 'Five thousand, here you are. Come again!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'After seeing off the last customer, Changyu returns to the pawnshop and carefully seals the pawned item he just received.'}
{2: 'Boss Wang', 3: 'Hey, kiddo. Clean up and get ready to call it a day.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Changyu', 3: 'Huh, why so early today?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Boss Wang', 3: "It's not like I want to. I just received a notice from the Chiwen Crew. No business after 5 p.m."}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: 'How come?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Boss Wang', 3: 'It probably has to do with the news report released by the World Government. Some experiment failed, and there was some sort of repercussion.'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: 'You mean zero-point energy?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Boss Wang', 3: 'Yeah, that thing. But the only repercussion is our loss of business!'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: 'No wonder the customers are all so sour-looking recently.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Boss Wang', 3: 'Hmph, you can say that again.'}
{2: 'Boss Wang', 3: "By the way, I also saw the notice that the celebration was postponed—the one you mentioned earlier that your theater's playing at."}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: 'What? It was postponed?!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Boss Wang', 3: "Can't help it. Hosting a celebration right now would be a slap in the face for the World Government."}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "Ugh... At least it's not cancelled. We'll just have to wait for this all to pass. Then everything will be back to normal.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Boss Wang', 3: "We can only hope so. The sooner the curfew ends, the sooner we can open normally. I'm going to head out. Be sure to lock up once you're done cleaning."}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: 'Yeah, got it.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'After Boss Wang leaves, Changyu returns to the counter. He turns on his data panel and begins to flip through the calendar.'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "It's delayed... But that's not necessarily a bad thing.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: 'That gives me more time to prepare for the performance. Director, just you wait...', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory236.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Changyu', 3: "Boss Wang, what's going on today? I've seen Pulao soldiers patrolling the streets.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Boss Wang', 3: 'The whole city is under a curfew. The zero-point thingamajig failed and created some virus. Apparently, a machine will go haywire if it becomes infected.'}

{2: 'Boss Wang', 3: "Now the soldiers are recycling machines, androids, and even all the police bots in the city—the uh, Guardians and Tai'E, I think? Anyway, they're all gone. Heard they're roundin' them up and disposing them all at once."}

{2: 'Changyu', 3: 'No wonder the Glazed Arch Theater next door has been so deserted recently. I thought they were upgrading the androids in preparation for something big during the celebration.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Boss Wang', 3: 'Alright, enough chit-chat. Throw this out for me.'}

{3: 'He throws Changyu a palm-sized robot from behind the counter. The electronic brain is hanging sideways, with indentations obviously caused by a blunt object. Several broken wires are also poking out of its casing.'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "Isn't this the robot you bought to wipe the cabinet? How did this happen?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Boss Wang', 3: "The soldiers don't recycle these lil' gizmos. Hmph, but who's to say it won't get infected and wreck the shop?"}
{2: 'Boss Wang', 3: "Don't just stand there. Get this eyesore out of here!"}
{3: 'Changyu picks up the broken pile of scrap metal and walks to the trash can in the alley around the corner.'}
{3: '...And he sees a trashcan filled to the brim with an assortment of mechanical parts—electronic terminals, carrier drones, and other household gadgets.'}
{3: 'The tools that once brought many conveniences to mankind were now completely destroyed and randomly discarded in the dark recesses of trash cans, mixed with foods scraps and other garbage.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Changyu', 3: "Pah... That's the way humans got their jobs back, huh?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Changyu shakes his head as he walks out of the alley. He sees several strange devices in the street erected by the Baxia Crew.'}
{3: 'Hearing the news, Boss Wang pokes his head out from the doorframe of the pawnshop and looks down the street.'}
{2: 'Boss Wang', 3: 'The KCC... is about to change.'}
{2: 'Boss Wang', 3: '"Indeed"? What does a kid like you know?'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "That's not what I meant...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Boss Wang', 3: 'Here, take this.'}
{3: 'Having no intention of arguing with Changyu, Boss Wang interrupts him by throwing him a data card.'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "Huh? Didn't you already pay me this month?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: 'A cheapskate like you is giving me a bonus?!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Boss Wang', 3: "Who are you callin' a cheapskate? It's called running a well-managed business. You should take some notes."}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: 'Whatever you say boss. As long as you keep paying me.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Boss Wang', 3: "Still playing the poverty card? Get out of here. I'm closing up shop."}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: 'Alright, alright. Quit pushing me. I was just on my way out.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Boss Wang pushes Changyu out as he speaks and impatiently motions him to hurry home.'}
{3: 'After Changyu boards the shuttle back to the South City District, Boss Wang returns to the shop.'}
{2: 'Boss Wang', 3: "Pah, I've been crunching numbers my whole life. This might be my last bit of generosity."}
{3: 'With that, Boss Wang takes off the weathered plaque to the door of the shop and firmly closes the pawnshop door.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory233.png'}
{2: 'Broadcast', 3: 'Up next, an emergency statement from the Kowloong Chamber of Commerce.'}
{2: 'Broadcast', 3: 'The Kowloong Chamber of Commerce is still under curfew. Please remain at home as much as possible and report any emergencies to the nearby Kowloong Crew immediately.'}
{2: 'Broadcast', 3: "Large machinery throughout the city has been recycled. Do not panic. This situation must be handled rationally. Now, let's listen to Lord Danhao, the Bian Crew official to..."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Director', 3: 'Changyu, where are you going?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Changyu', 3: "Hehe, I'm just goin' out for a bit.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Director', 3: "Didn't you hear the broadcast? Are you really going out with all that's happened?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Changyu', 3: "I'm just one last step away from fixing all the props. Just wait a bit longer, Director.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Director', 3: 'How are you still thinking about the celebration at a time like this?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Changyu', 3: "The celebration isn't what matters. I just want to get the Kowloong Theater up and running again.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Changyu quickly drags the props out of the theater and leaves the nagging director behind.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Changyu', 3: 'Almost there.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory237.png'}
{2: 'Broadcast', 3: 'Up next, an emergency statement from the World Government on the Punishing Virus.'}
{2: 'Broadcast', 3: 'We face an unprecedented disaster in human history. The Science Council has launched a comprehensive investigation, and the Star of Life is actively seeking a cure.'}

{3: "Throughout the streets, the World Government's updates on the Punishing Virus is being broadcasted in real-time. The once prosperous KCC is now long gone. Only a few pedestrians are watching the broadcast on the street."}
{3: 'The broadcast echoes throughout Kowloong. Changyu quickly shuttles between the road with the props in hand.'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "What! It's closed...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Changyu starts to grow flustered at the sight of the locked repair shop.'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: 'What should I do now? It was open yesterday.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "Damn it! There aren't any shops nearby that can repair our old equipment.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gangster A', 3: "Hey, punk. Today's our lucky day."}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: 'You guys again?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: 'Who are you calling a punk?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "Leave me alone. I'm not in the mood for this right now.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gangster A', 3: "What are you sayin', tough guy?!"}
{2: 'Gangster B', 3: "Don't you know? I've got a bone to pick with you. I'm going to make you suffer today."}
{2: 'Gangster B', 3: 'Most of the police cyborgs have been disposed of, and the Pulao Crew are busy with the plaza and the East City District. Who can save you now?'}
{3: 'Suddenly, the deafening sound of a broadcast plays in the distance, cutting through the air.'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "**** you. I don't need anyone's help to take care of you guys.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "Don't you wanna fight? Bring it!", 4: '1'}
